A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Fun\, exciting\, lovingly characterized\, but what really makes this installment shine is that it has substantial thematic content. 

Just as the original trilogy was a parable for Vietnam era America\, The Last Jedi is a thoughtful sci-fi look at the  challenges that face Gen-Xers and Millenials as they inherit the failings of the Boomers. 

Wonderful! Best Star Wars of our time.
